about_the_game:
Synopsis the Finally, Our Love Is Eternal.

Let's start with the hero, named Jonathan, meets Dorathy at the beach. From that day, the two fell in love and lived happily ever after. until one day There was a change in the lord in which the two people lived. which this lord has greed wanting other people's things to be theirs until that governor met Dorathy and a desire for Dorathy became his own therefore devised a scheme to steal Dorathy from the Jonathan And that's the beginning of the separation.
When Jonathan was devised by the governor By separating the two lovers, the governor sent Jonathan to a distant place. Jonathan must try to travel back to his beloved wife Dorathy. So the story of Jonathan's journey begins.

in-game content
1. You will find an adventurous journey. Go with a companion who has friendship, love and sacrifice.
2. There are puzzles to solve during the journey. Get information from the villagers to translate the clues into the door password numbers. to pass the checkpoint
3. Fight enemies using commands. When you win, you will gain experience to level up your character. And earn money to buy things in the game shop
4. You will find more than 1 ending by your own judgment. Deciding on an option will lead to a different ending.
5. There is a gacha to find legendary weapons
6. Find materials to make powerful weapons.
detailed_description:
Synopsis the Finally, Our Love Is Eternal.

Let's start with the hero, named Jonathan, meets Dorathy at the beach. From that day, the two fell in love and lived happily ever after. until one day There was a change in the lord in which the two people lived. which this lord has greed wanting other people's things to be theirs until that governor met Dorathy and a desire for Dorathy became his own therefore devised a scheme to steal Dorathy from the Jonathan And that's the beginning of the separation.
When Jonathan was devised by the governor By separating the two lovers, the governor sent Jonathan to a distant place. Jonathan must try to travel back to his beloved wife Dorathy. So the story of Jonathan's journey begins.

in-game content
1. You will find an adventurous journey. Go with a companion who has friendship, love and sacrifice.
2. There are puzzles to solve during the journey. Get information from the villagers to translate the clues into the door password numbers. to pass the checkpoint
3. Fight enemies using commands. When you win, you will gain experience to level up your character. And earn money to buy things in the game shop
4. You will find more than 1 ending by your own judgment. Deciding on an option will lead to a different ending.
5. There is a gacha to find legendary weapons
6. Find materials to make powerful weapons.

short_description: JRPG 2D retro pixel adventure puzzle drama love sacrifice tells the story of a young man who must travel to get back to his lover. The gameplay is a walk to find information from the characters around you. to find a way to continue Walk against enemies with battle commands.
